newsitem.title: USA: GST Telecom unit issues $265 mln 144A debt.
newsitem.headline: GST Telecom unit issues $265 mln 144A debt.

text.p: The following 144A high-yield debt issue from GST Equipment Funding Inc, a subsidiary of GST Telecommunications Inc, was priced on Thursday, according to a syndicate source.
The issue, increased in size by $35 million, features a three year interest reserve of approximately $93.8 million, the source added.
GST Telecommunications is a competitive local exchange carrier that operates primarily on the West Coast and Hawaii.
Morgan Stanley & Co was lead manager on the deal.
TYPE SNR SEC NOTES ISS PRICE 100.00 FIRST PAY DATE 11/01/97
LAST MOODY'S NR YIELD 13.25 PCT PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P NR SPREAD 652 BP CALLABLE NON-CALL FIVE
